name: smallorange-dynamodb-client
description: Lightweight dynamoDb client built on top of RxJS

scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add --all; git commit -m 'build' && npm version patch -m 'Bump %s' && git push origin master && npm publish
scripts.coverage: rm -rf ./coverage ./__coverage__ && NODE_ENV=test_coverage node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir __coverage__/src --source-maps --copy-files && NODE_ENV=test_coverage node_modules/.bin/babel testing --out-dir __coverage__/testing --copy-files && NODE_ENV=test_coverage node_modules/.bin/babel spec --out-dir __coverage__/spec && NODE_ENV=test_coverage ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- './__coverage__/spec' --recursive --timeout 5000 --require ./testing/helpers/suite.js --ui ui && ./node_modules/.bin/remap-istanbul -i ./coverage/coverage-final.json -o ./coverage/html-report -t html -e /__coverage__/spec,/__coverage__/testing; rm -rf __coverage__

author: Felipe Rohde
